com.cyc.baseclient.kbtool

Class CycInferenceTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.baseclient.AbstractKBTool
      • com.cyc.baseclient.kbtool.CycInferenceTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceTool

    public class CycInferenceTool
extends AbstractKBTool
implements InferenceTool
    Tools for performing inferences over the Cyc KB. To lookup facts in the Cyc KB, use the CycLookupTool.
    See Also:
    CycLookupTool

                     CycObject mt,
                     InferenceParameters queryProperties)
                       throws CycConnectionException,
                              CycApiException
        Deprecated. use executeQuery
        Asks a Cyc query (new inference parameters) and returns the binding list.
        Parameters:
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values
        Returns:
        the binding list resulting from the given query
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException
        IOException - if a communications error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • executeQuery

        public InferenceResultSet executeQuery(FormulaSentence query,
                              ELMt mt,
                              InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                              long timeoutMsecs)
                                throws CycConnectionException,
                                       CycApiException,
                                       CycTimeOutException
        Run a synchronous query against Cyc.

        Note: One should put this call in a try/finally statement and the finally statement should explicitly close the result set. Failure to do so could cause garbage to accumulate on the server.
        Specified by:
        executeQuery in interface InferenceTool
        Parameters:
        query - the query in CycArrayList form to ask
        mt - the microtheory in which the query should be asked
        queryProperties - the query properties to use when asking the query
        timeoutMsecs - the amount of time in milliseconds to wait before giving up. A zero for this value means to wait forever.
        Returns:
        the DefaultResultSet which provides a convenient mechanism for walking over results similar to java.sql.ResultSet
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException
        IOException - if a communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if an internal error occurs
        CycTimeOutException - if the query times out

      • executeQuery

        public InferenceResultSet executeQuery(String query,
                              Object mt,
                              InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                              long timeoutMsecs)
                                throws CycConnectionException,
                                       CycApiException,
                                       CycTimeOutException
        Run a synchronous query against Cyc.

        Note: One should put this call in a try/finally statement and the finally statement should explicitly close the result set. Failure to do so could cause garbage to accumulate on the server.
        Specified by:
        executeQuery in interface InferenceTool
        Parameters:
        query - the query in String form to ask
        mt - the microtheory in which the query should be asked (as a String, CycObject or ELMt)
        queryProperties - the query properties to use when asking the query
        timeoutMsecs - the amount of time in milliseconds to wait before giving up. A zero for this value means to wait forever.
        Returns:
        the DefaultResultSet which provides a convenient mechanism for walking over results similar to java.sql.ResultSet
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if an internal error occurs
        CycTimeOutException - if the query times out
        CycConnectionException - if a communication error occurs

      • queryResultsToXMLString

        public String queryResultsToXMLString(CycList query,
                             CycObject mt,
                             InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                             CycList xmlSpec)
                               throws CycConnectionException,
                                      CycApiException
        Asks a Cyc query (new inference parameters) and returns an XML stream according to the specifications in the CycArrayList xmlSpec.
        Parameters:
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values
        xmlSpec - the specification of elements, attributes, sort order and bindings for the XML that the method returns
        Returns:
        the binding list from the query in the XML format specified by xmlSpec
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communications error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error
        CycConnectionException

      • isQueryTrue

        public boolean isQueryTrue(CycList query,
                  CycObject mt,
                  InferenceParameters queryProperties)
                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Returns true if the Cyc query (with inference parameters) is proven true.
        Specified by:
        isQueryTrue in interface InferenceTool
        Parameters:
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used
        Returns:
        true if the query is proven true.
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communications error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error or if there are open variables in the query
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs

        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory

        Throws:

        UnknownHostException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error or if there are open variables in the query

        variables - the list of unbound variables for which bindings are sought
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to be used
        Returns:
        the binding list resulting from the given query
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communications error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs

      • askCycQuery

        public CycList askCycQuery(CycList query,
                  CycObject mt,
                  Object maxTransformationDepth,
                  Object maxNumber,
                  Object maxTimeSeconds,
                  Object maxProofDepth)
                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Asks a Cyc query and returns the binding list. Properties:
        Specified by:
        askCycQuery in interface InferenceTool
        Parameters:
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        maxTransformationDepth - the Integer maximum transformation depth or nil for no limit
        maxNumber - the Integer maximum number of returned bindings or nil for no limit
        maxTimeSeconds - the Integer maximum number of seconds inference duration or nil for no limit
        maxProofDepth - the Integer maximum number of levels in the proof tree or nil for no limit
        Returns:
        the binding list of answers for the given query and inference property settings
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error
        CycConnectionException - if a communication error occurs

                    CycObject mt)
                      throws CycConnectionException,
                             CycApiException
        Returns a list of bindings for a query with a single unbound variable.
        Specified by:
        queryVariable in interface InferenceTool

        public CycList askWithVariables(CycList query,
                       List variables,
                       CycObject mt)
                         throws CycConnectionException,
                                CycApiException
        Deprecated. use queryVariables
        Returns a list of bindings for a query with unbound variables. The bindings each consist of a list in the order of the unbound variables list parameter, in which each bound term is the binding for the corresponding variable.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be asked in the knowledge base
        variables - the list of unbound variables in the query for which bindings are sought
        mt - the microtheory in which the query is asked
